text: @realDonaldTrump @foxandfriends @CNN ARE YOU REALLY WORRIED ABOUT TV RATINGS RIGHT NOW? What a reprehensible, unmitigated monster! (ask one of your aids for a dictionary) The fact that you even exist sickens me...May COVID-19 catch you soon and with an appropriate vengeance. RESIGN.
